This is the DAO section! All about the DAO and Governance!
What do you want to see?
Proposals are proposals to allocate portions of the DAO
treasury (can vary in size) in ways that meaningfully add
to the growth and prosperity of the Nouns project. Proposals
can only be proposed by Nouns holders!
Candidates are just like proposals, but they can be created
by anyone (unlike proposals, which need to be proposed by
someone with a Noun). If promoted, it becomes a proposal!
"Forking" in general terms refers to a group of token
holders splitting up into sub-groups, generally due to a
difference in vision or strong opposing opinions.
In the case of Nouns, there is an in-built fork mechanism,
which was voted on and passed for the first time on
